about_the_game:
The Ancient Land of Havos:

In the world of "The Legend of Chosen Blood", you will be in a fantasy world "Land of Havos" where darkness and magic blend. You will play the role of an awakened person with ancient bloodline, overcome unknown dangers, and defeat powerful monsters! Uncover the ancient legends of this continent!

A Fantasy World of Darkness and Magic:

In the ancient times, the continent of Havos was full of spiritual energy. This vast and fertile land gave birth to countless lives, including many powerful magical creatures. These high-level magical creatures relied on their own high-level magic to survive in Havos. unscrupulously competed for territory and killed other species. At this time, humans became very passive because they could not sense magic and could be destroyed at any time. This darkness lasted for centuries...

Finally, the five gods sent by the Supreme Ruler arrived in Havos. The gods suppressed these advanced species with an iron fist, set down divine laws, and stabilized the order of Havos. Then these five gods were in charge of their own affairs. The realms of the two countries do not interfere with each other, but under the illusion of peace, the real darkest moment has just begun...

Refreshing and Smooth Combat:

You can choose a variety of fighting methods, which can be roughly divided into physical attacks and magical attacks. When using physical attacks, you can choose several weapons from five types: long sword, short knife, battle axe, war hammer and staff. Each weapon They all have different attack methods and characteristics.





For magic attacks, you can use seven basic attribute magics: fire magic, ice magic, water magic, thunder magic, wind magic, natural magic and earth magic, as well as ancient magic obtained through the "Trial of Gods". Each magic will cause different increase and decrease effects. Using a reasonable release sequence can trigger magic derivation effects, and derive low-level magic to high-level magic!

Build your own exclusive genre! Get more advantages in battle!

Build Your Own Territory:

In your territory, you can unlock more functions or decorate your home by building various buildings, including alchemy, research, planting, runes, forging, etc. You can continuously strengthen your equipment and refine power. Potions and planting consumables will make the next battle easier!




Thrilling Storyline:

In Havos, you can freely experience and choose the game storyline, and explore the ancient secrets of Havos in the main and side stories.

Rich and Charming Seasonal Changes:

The time and weather in Havos are both dynamic, and you can feel the wonderful seasonal changes and diverse ecological environments.
